website_summaries.verdict: This exceedingly popular pack of inflatable pool noodles offers fantastic quality for an affordable price tag.
pros: Noodles are inflatable for simple storage
Easy to travel with when not inflated
Comes with three curved noodles for sitting and straddling, as well as three straight noodles
cons: Customers had problems with the air stopper staying shut when inflating

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was very timely (thanks to Prime 😊) Easily inflated. If I had a pump that deflates, then this would have been a five star rating ;) Stayed inflated. Very sturdy and colorful. We used them during a 2 day lake escapade and they provided great floatation and support for the kids and adults. Comfortable to use. Taking them on vaca required very little space. Great purchase for a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: neira

customer_reviews.title: Like these better than foam noodles
customer_reviews.text: Saw these when I was on vacation and someone had them in the hotel pool. I liked that they were inflatable and came straight or curvy. Ordered them and they were delivered quickly. Inflated half of them for a party and one blue one had a hole in it. The three I had for the party were heavily used and held up well. I inflated the remaining 2 and found the other blue one had a pinhole in it. So, both blue ones weren't useable. But for $12 for 6 it was worth it. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L

customer_reviews.title: Best water toy invention ever.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. They work as well as the regular foam noodles but are inflatable so packable!! We first tried them out in our pool (two adults - one at 138 lbs the other at 180 lbs) and they supported us both allowing for great floating fun. Since then we have taken them on two island trips where we used them every day to float in the ocean. You can position the doodle behind your back and under your arms, hold a beverage, and float for hours. I used to take more cumbersome inflatable floats on our island vacations but now take these because they do everything I want, pack up so small, and inflate/deflate in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Carolee

customer_reviews.title: They were easy enough to blow up by mouth and easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: We missed the season to buy the foam noodles so I found these online. They were easy enough to blow up by mouth and easy to deflate (once we thought to slip the rounded end of a kabob stick in the valve to hold open the plastic piece that keeps the air from rushing out as you are blowing it up). They rolled back up once deflated and are easily stored. They did seem to loose a little air as the children played with them but not so much that they did not keep them afloat.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Are not a noodle
customer_reviews.text: I got these because noodles decay over time and shred in the pool. These were slippery and kids could not stay on them. I doesn't bare the weight in the water like a foam noodle does. Sorry to say, I won't be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Lindberg

customer_reviews.title: Fun! Packs flat!
customer_reviews.text: Great for packing flat and travel with! Got them for a weekend of pool time, they were a hit with our friends. To be able to sit and ride on it, an average adult would probably need two noodles to stay afloat. Very fun!
customer_reviews.author: consumer 101

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Great Quality, Tons of fun!
customer_reviews.text: I found these by accident on Amazon while searching for an inflatable for me, but the price was great and I thought my kids would have fun with these in the pool in Mexico. I'm so glad I bought them! They are easy to blow up and were perfect for my kids and nephews! (The kids ages were 3 - 10yrs old) They used them under their arms, between their legs as seahorses and of course as swords :) All 4 kids loved playing with these and they were used a couple of times when the kids were tired and needed something to help them float where they couldn't touch. I'm very happy I got these!
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: I actually use these as bed bumpers for my son ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually use these as bed bumpers for my son so he doesn't fall out of beds when we travel. At home, we use real pool noodles but those aren't exactly portable, so I bought these to throw into the suitcase. I can sleep easier knowing he won't roll out of hotel beds!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the portability. They're well made and the material seems sturdy. We used it to just out in the beautiful Caribbean. I like the self-closing valve - it lets you take a breather between blowing it up. Deflating is a breeze - one of us squeezes the valve and the other rolls it up slowly from the other end.
customer_reviews.author: mhp_1Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Doodles are better than Noodles
customer_reviews.text: If you have the regular Styrofoam Noodles, and live in a hot, humid place like Florida, you probably have had pieces of Styrofoam floating around in the water. These doodles are just the answer. They were easy to blow up...with an electric pump of course, and my grandchildren loved them. When they go back home we can easily deflate some of them and they will store much better than Styrofoam.
customer_reviews.author: K LTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Pool / Ocean / Backyard / Travel
customer_reviews.text: Fun noodles! I didn't think much about them being inflatable and reusable until someone said they take with them on vacation! We've purchased so many when we fly and leave when done. I thought this might be a solution in the future. We currently used them for games we played in our backyard during a family weekend. Two were deflated but abused by adults during the game time. I wasn't surprised. I think the quality would be fine for pool time.
customer_reviews.author: C. Coulter

customer_reviews.title: Not a hit at our home
customer_reviews.text: We received the doodles quickly as promised. I was so excited to get them and thought my grandsons (10 & 12) would love them, but they just did not. They do not play with them at all. We inflated them and they took them in the pool the first day played with them for about 10 minutes and then out they came, they have been beside the pool box since. I have left them out hoping they would play with them again, but they prefer the basketball game or the large noodles. Our granddaughters arrive in a couple weeks, will update if they play with them, but the boys did not find them fun or fascinating at all.
customer_reviews.author: cassie's mom

customer_reviews.title: Great product for pools.
customer_reviews.text: We have used these for 4 years running in our pool. I won’t allow the foam noodles because the will ultimately damage our filter system. Over 3 years of use we have lost about 50% to damage or misuse. I bought 12originalky and this year will get another six pack to replace the lost ones. Excellent product that helps me feel I’m being both cost and eco conscious.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Perfect to Float with! :)
customer_reviews.text: These work wonders, I was forever buying the noodles with the foam and they would disintegrate or get dirty during storage even in the cleanest area.. tried these and they even hold you upright when you sit in the middle! I am not a small woman by any means I weigh a decent amount and these are perfect to use to relax in the pool. Only con I have is when I opened them they smelled of antibiotic cream or a bag balm and it was pretty strong. It was not as strong after use in the pool but it was still noticeable even days after usage.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: saw these on a youtube video. bought them for our family cruise. takes up very little space and why pay to rent floats when you have your own. worked well can not tell how long they will last but I am going to store smartly so they will be in good shape for next cruise.
customer_reviews.author: Therese L

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for travel. They take up no room in luggage and way nothing. Great for use with Swimways noodle chair. Good for sitting riding or laying across for snorkeling. You can use one or two if you are a little bigger. You get so many in the pack, there is one for everyone. I did not notice much difference between the curved or flat. Pretty sturdy, too.
customer_reviews.author: Vdub

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for travel!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for a recent trip to Disney. They inflated very quickly and took a beating in and out of the pool! They were dragged by children through the hotel and pool cement without any issues. At the end of our trip, the deflated nicely into their original folded form. Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take anywhere
customer_reviews.text: These are so much better than the pool noodles I usually get... Those ones start disintegrating and make a mess but I love these... Especially the fact that I can pack them for vacation... The kids love them and so do I for floating around the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Weller

customer_reviews.title: Fun, sturdy, and convenient
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for a day on the lake. With a hand air pump, it took less than 10 minutes to blow up all 6 doodles. Very easy and convenient to transport, they did not take up much room. In the deep water, they felt very sturdy, no defects or leakage, and easy to swim with. An adult at 200 lbs only needed a single doodle, with no issues. They were fast and easy to deflate, under 10 minutes, as well, for all six. And then easy to roll back up and store in a small bag. Fast shipment/delivery, too, with receiving in just one-day with Prime.
customer_reviews.author: TMR

customer_reviews.title: Best noodle ever
customer_reviews.text: Our kids like pool noodles but hate lugging them around. Tgese deflate abd can be rolled into a snall circumference. Kids can take in suitcase or backpack for traveling. And no itch pool noodle butn marks from the texture. Set of six costs just a few bucks. Great deal abd pretty colors
customer_reviews.author: One old lady

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Had s pool party and was excited to get these in the pool..well the suction to blow up would not hold tight and kept popping up where tubes deflated..I mean all 4 out of the 6!! I only bought due to good reviews, but those have to be FAKE..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Served their purpose
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome when you want to travel with pool noodles but don't have the space in the suitcase. the package they come in is only ~ 6" x 6" 2". These inflatable noodles worked well for 4 adults over a 10 day trip to Mexico. They can be easily deflated and brought home, but for the price I just leave them at the resort for someone else to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A.

customer_reviews.title: Noodle for your suitcase!
customer_reviews.text: Last time I snorkeled in Bonaire I paid $9 for a foam noodle. How I wish I had purchased these Doodles before that trip. They are sturdy, easy to inflate AND deflate, and fold up to a small square. Don't go to the beach without one!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Travel Friendly
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a beach trip - worth every penny! They are actually more buoyant than the regular foam noodles and they dry faster since they don’t absorb water at all. Deflate and inflate easily. I won’t need to re buy for ages since they were very durable, but I will if they ever pop.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan M.

customer_reviews.title: All Six Lost Air within 24 Hours (and These Haven't Been in the Water Yet)
customer_reviews.text: Very thin. I inflated them and left them on the floor. Within 24 hours, all six lost air. In 36 hours, they were at the point of needing more air before the very first use in our pool.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Do the Doodle!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife and I to use on vacation in Greece since we were going to be on the beach and swimming a lot. They are the greatest thing ever. You can sit on them and sit perfectly upright, wrap them around your back and float facing up, wrap around your chest.....all awesome. I read some reviews that they aren't buoyant enough for large adults but they are more than enough, and I weigh 240. This was in salt water though, where people float much easier so I'm not positive how fresh water will work but I'm guessing they'll still work fine. We haven't had a single one rip/break. I really can't recommend them enough.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Doodles for days!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these over a year ago and they are still going strong!! They are just as bouyant as the foam noodles and don't get water logged. I have inflated and deflated them several times without any holes developing. Easily packable....have taken them on several vacations as well as use at our home pool. Highly recommend!! For just under $2 per noodle....they are a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fry

customer_reviews.title: Great pool noodles
customer_reviews.text: We love these pool noodles! I like that there was a 6 pack of them, 3 straight, 3 curvy. They're easy and quick to inflate. And they deflate for easy and compact storage.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Meyer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for beach travels
customer_reviews.text: Inflatable noodles?? What?! We saw someone using these at the beach and we immediately bought some on Amazon. When new, and deflated, each one is about the size of a paperback novel. Inflate at your destination, use it for a few days, then deflate. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Durable and Great for Travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to take with me on a cruise. Rather than having to rent floating mats I simply blow up the noodle. It's so much easier to work with and the kids love them too. When I am at home I keep them in my pool bag. They are easy to blow up and just as easy to deflat and store in my bag. One less item to have to carry. I have already gone through two summers and they are very durable.
customer_reviews.author: LK in Florida

customer_reviews.title: At Lease One Damaged
customer_reviews.text: These are cute but at least 1 out of 3 won't hold air, straight out of the package (the other 2 I've tried don't hold air for long but hold for at least a while) and I haven't even tried the other 3 yet. There is no hole we can find so it must be the seams. But I don't want the hassle of returning so it is somewhat annoying. I saw review saying they are individually packaged. Mine weren't - doesn't matter to me but maybe it does to others.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect to take on vacation. Fits well in my suitcase, blow them up when you arrive and deflate them when you leave so you can repack them to take home for your next trip.
customer_reviews.author: DB8423

customer_reviews.title: Get these for your next beach trip.
customer_reviews.text: The doodles are easily packable. Take a bit of breathe to blow up but work as described. We saw a number of people using them at the beach and pool.
customer_reviews.author: long time customer

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect to pack for a destination trip since they could ...
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect to pack for a destination trip since they could be inflated after arrival. I thoughtthe quality was fabulous for the money. We didn't have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Powe Metz

customer_reviews.title: EVERYONE asks me where I got them!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Especially the curved ones. I spend alot of time vacationing at Disney Resorts and I bring these EVERY time we go! I can't tell you how many people ask me where I bought them, and how much they love them!! The curved ones I just wrap my arms around the back and lay my head back, and relax......Try them, you will love them!!!!! Easy to pack, blow up, deflate, and durable. They come with a "fix it patch" just in case, but I have never needed them.
customer_reviews.author: kristina hogue

customer_reviews.title: Good disposable blow up noodles for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Good disposable blow up noodles for traveling! Will buy again. Took them to Cancun for the resort pool and left behind for some small children. They do tend to lose a little air each time you use them, but not a big deal to add a little air. That's why I consider them disposable.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Barry

customer_reviews.title: Kid approved
customer_reviews.text: My daughter saw some kids at the pool with these and had to have them. They are easy to inflate and sturdy. She plays with them beating everything and dragging them through the house when we aren't at the pool and they've still held up. Worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: Erica D.

customer_reviews.title: HOLES
customer_reviews.text: THESE NOODLES MAY BE GOOD FOR A SINGLE DAYS FUN, BUT IF YOUR TRYING TO STOCK UP ON POOL OR BEACH TOYS THESE WILL HAVE A HOLE IN THEM BY DAYS END. I THINK THE REASON TRADITIONAL POOL NOODLES ARE SO POPULAR IS BECAUSE THEY NEVER GET HOLES IN THEM. I'LL BE STICKING TO THOSE FOR NOW.
customer_reviews.author: DEREK D

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: I took these with us on a cruise and they were perfect. They fold up small for packing, inflate quickly, and are very buoyant and durable. We used them at the beach. Of course since they are inflatable, they are not meant to be used if you can't swim. I would not rely on them if I were in water that I can not swim in, but they are great for lounging and as an aid for snorkeling. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: kimka68

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this product, very cheap they all broke in one day.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: They deflate pretty quickly. Get the foam ones instead
customer_reviews.text: I didn't catch that these were inflatable when I purchase them. Now I see why they were so inexpensive. But had high hopes they would at least last for a while. They have not. They deflate pretty quickly. Get the foam ones instead.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Much better than noodles
customer_reviews.text: These are the greatest! They inflate quickly and easily and are sturdy. They don’t disintegrate in the sun or pool like regular noodles.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L.

customer_reviews.title: My kids loved it and so did the other kids staying at ...
customer_reviews.text: We used these on a recent family vacation and it worked very well. My kids loved it and so did the other kids staying at the hotel. The other kids all wanted to borrow them and they had so much fun that they wanted their own. I appreciate the fact that it is portable and packs into our suitcases very easily. These will go with us on every vacation from now on.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: The surface sticks to your skin a bit which isn't comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The surface sticks to your skin a bit which isn't comfortable, but they are handy to keep in the car or in a bag when hiking. A matte surface would be better.
customer_reviews.author: greasergrrl

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold air
customer_reviews.text: Out of 6 of these, 2 of them didn't hold air at all and 2 had slow leaks. Only 2 were good so I had to return them all. I liked the ones that worked but frustrated that was only 2 out of 6.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: We took 4 of these to a Mexican resort and were so glad we had them!! Used them all the time. All held air which I couldn't say for some other water floaties we saw being used. Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Haziedays

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect these doodles to hold up as well as they did. We brought them on vacation to Aruba with us. They were easy to pack in the suitcase, taking up a lot less space than traditional noodles, easy to dry off, deflate, and still in excellent condition. The air in them held up well. I would highly recommend them. You get six in a pack.... 3 straight, 3 curved... 3 different colors, 2 red, 2 yellow, 2 blue.
customer_reviews.author: J Russo

customer_reviews.title: These were so great everyone at the hotel tried to take one!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for vacation! I took them on the plane in the suitcase and inflated them at the hotel pool. All of the other guests thought they belonged to the hotel, so they were quickly "stolen" by other children so beware! They are fun though! My kids loved them.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Love these “Doodles” pool noodles!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a large family with many friends over for pool time! Everyone uses and loves these Doodles and they have held up throughout the season. Best part is that we will deflate and reuse next year. Easy to store and they don't disintegrate with pool chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: alicia wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Took to Cabo and used in the ocean....durable and very comfortable to float around on. Noodles that can be deflated are the best!! Great product for the price. I'll use them this summer in my pool for sure.
customer_reviews.author: wmitch

customer_reviews.title: More Portable than Foam
customer_reviews.text: Cute, easy, portable. Easier to travel with than foam noodles. They are not difficult to inflate or deflate. We have only used them a few times, but we haven't had any issues with holes or losing large quantities of air. I would estimate the weight capacity of one noodle to be at least 300 pounds. Not an approved floatation or life saving device. Not a replacement for swimming lessons, supervision, keeping all non-strong swimmers within arm's reach at all times, etc.
customer_reviews.author: LDK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap and easy! They blow up very quickly and work great. We used them on a boating vacation and they were small to pack and cheap enough to leave them behind. Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: CCS

customer_reviews.title: Won't travel without these!
customer_reviews.text: I've used these at all inclusive resorts, beach excursions on cruises, and trips to the lake. They inflate and deflate easily. Great for both kids and adults. They are lightweight and pack easily. They are inexpensive and reusable over and over again. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Raine H.

customer_reviews.title: Best cheap pool or lake accessory purchase ever.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best! Great for trips to beach, dayhiking to lakes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: BrianMG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to pack for trips.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to take on a trip to Mexico. Easy to pack in the suitcase. The kids loved having something to use in the resort pools, and I loved not having to pay the resort prices. The curved ones worked amazingly well to ride the ocean waves! Best part, we gave away 3 of the 6 to kids still at the resort when we left. Hope they enjoyed them just as much!
customer_reviews.author: P. Eberhardt

customer_reviews.title: Travel size
customer_reviews.text: This product does not take a long time to blow up and easy to pack in your suitcase when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Cocobrown4lyfe

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold air
customer_reviews.text: We bought these in the past with no problems. Great for traveling to use in pool. However, out of the six in the pack, all three of the blue ones were defective. Small leaks where the seams were in two of the three. The third blue one had a small pin size hole in the middle of the float making no sense.
customer_reviews.author: William J.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to inflate, not super strong
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to inflate. Most of my normal adult sized friends need two or more to stay afloat though. Overall decent quality for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Easy to travel with.
customer_reviews.text: Great for traveling with. Enough for everyone in the family.
customer_reviews.author: edlynnetx

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Had a hard time keeping the little airlet ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Had a hard time keeping the little airlet valve cover in place at first, but after some use they've started staying in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun and practical
customer_reviews.text: Have bought over 100. Greatest thing since sliced cheese. 75 people took Them To Puerto Vallarta they now up and deflate. Very sturdy holds at 500lbs up
customer_reviews.author: Candyce McFarlane

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY. DEFECTIVE PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughters, and 4 out of the 6 inflatable noodles wouldn't hold air, straight out of the box. They leaked, went flat right away, and sent up visible large bubbles when held in water. Nothing but trouble and disappointment. Don't waste your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: A. Thomasson

customer_reviews.title: I like them. They look pretty in the pool
customer_reviews.text: I like them. They look pretty in the pool, and they don't fall apart and leave a film like regular noodles. Having said that, they're not as sturdy as regular noodles. I replace my regular noodles every year, but with the doodles, I may not have too. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: cjo

customer_reviews.title: Noodle
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Great substitution to the original noodle when traveling. Great invention. Thanks!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: P. Tromp

customer_reviews.title: Will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.text: These noodles worked well with a mesh water hammock that I also purchased. They're long enough for adults and buoyant enough for floating.
customer_reviews.author: Jass

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These were nice to have on vacation since they deflate. Perfect for laying on the edges of beds to keep my daughter from rolling out of bed and also to use in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Katherin

customer_reviews.title: Seam on side or curved ones very annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Half of them had deflated with leaks after one swim party. Only use is if you need them to be portable otherwise avoid. Seam on side or curved ones very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: W. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Doodles portable fun pool noodles
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trip to Cabo. They worked great and stayed inflated for the entire week. I suggest you get some kind of hand pump to inflate them. Got pretty dizzy blowing up just two of them. They pack well in a suitcase and eliminate the need to score one of the few resort furnished floats.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: blow up noodle
customer_reviews.text: These are great! The fact that they blow up and then you can take the air out to store them are fantastic. We gave them as a party favor for my grand daughters Birthday and everyone loved them.
customer_reviews.author: margaret

customer_reviews.title: Suited its purpose, but really one major flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Suited its purpose, but really one major flaw. the seams on the floats are on the outside of the noodle, so that they rub and irritate your skin/arms when you float.
customer_reviews.author: Aquaman

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: A must have for beach vacation travels! I love these!
customer_reviews.author: Susan K. Schilling

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because we were going to have a stop over in St. Thomas and we were going to go to Magens Bay and needed something to float on, instead of paying $10/pp for a float. These were absolutely perfect! They're light to carry around and easy to blow up by the mouth, no pump needed. They've held up a few times and I'm going to continue bringing them on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: RandomGuy

customer_reviews.title: nice.
customer_reviews.text: great for travel. not sure how durable they are, but they made it through a 2 week vacation. easy to inflate, and way less expensive than buying at the beach. bought a balloon pump at the dollar store inflated them in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bellestri

customer_reviews.title: Great pool noodles!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a one time pool party. I did not expect or need them to last multiple uses. We had 30+ kids using these pool noodles and they held up very well. I will definitely use these next season too!
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: They'll do
customer_reviews.text: One of the pool noodles had a pin hole in it upon arrival. The others are all right. The kids enjoy them and I guess that's what matters.
customer_reviews.author: BONNIE

customer_reviews.title: Portable floating
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to bring with me on a cruise. Took them to the beach at the stops. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a great alternative to foam
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to avoid the inevitable cracking and pitting of styrofoam noodles. These don't hold the air very well resulting in lack of buoyancy.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory L. Weishaar

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Small and easy to travel with. Blows up easily! Doesn't take up room in a beach bag or carry on for the plane. Will be buying more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these based on reviews. And everyone was right. I cannot thank the seller enough for getting these out to me so quickly. I ordered these with standard shipping hoping I would get before the weekend but not expecting it. Thank you - I got them before the weekend!!! I had 7 10 year old girls here swimming and abusing all my floats. They held up so well!!! Not one of them popped or deflated!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Easy travel
customer_reviews.text: Worked great , took them to Aruba, perfect for floating in the waves and easy to pack
customer_reviews.author: Brian Moore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all my cruise vacations!! Very Sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, perfect to pack away and take on vacation. We bought them because they pack up nicely in our luggage. They happen to be very sturdy and have been using them for several years with no blow outs. Buy them and float off on your Caribbean cruise.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette

customer_reviews.title: Six Feet Long?
customer_reviews.text: The noodles were only 5' 6" as was noted in another review. I was hoping it was incorrect, but it is true! Since we are using these in classrooms to indicate a 6' distance the shorter distance isn't as precise as we would like!
customer_reviews.author: BLuby

customer_reviews.title: Took on a cruise and worked as expected. Did ...
customer_reviews.text: Took on a cruise and worked as expected. Did not have any problems with leaks, popping, etc. Was very convenient for taking to beach or to the pool.
customer_reviews.author: S. Crane

customer_reviews.title: Great for vacation
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for our trip to Turks & Caicos. Everyone kept asking where we got them. The whole family enjoyed them from the kids to the adults. The bonus was that they are so cheap we left them there for another family to enjoy without caring about what they cost.
customer_reviews.author: P. Sizemore

customer_reviews.title: then it's not as bad but be prepared for them to deflate quickly
customer_reviews.text: They are ok if you just want a light float for kids, but these do not hold up. They do not compare to the traditional "funoodle" type foam ones. If you use two together, then it's not as bad but be prepared for them to deflate quickly. Overall, for the price and for travel purposes as others have said, they are just ok.
customer_reviews.author: JosieShopsTooMuch

customer_reviews.title: Never buy old type noodles again!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! These do not crumble like the Styrofoam noodles. Do not crumble into your pool filter or smell bad with Ocean water. Baby grandson used to teeth on the Styrofoam ones and even bit a hunk out of one, choking hazard! Plus they deflate and store easily. We live in Fl and these hold up to sun,chlorine and salt!
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Nikesch

customer_reviews.title: Love these- ordered them to take on a cruise for ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these- ordered them to take on a cruise for use during our beach day. They inflated easily and held up for all day of floating in the ocean! We received many compliments and questions where I bought them from. I probably could've sold them right there on the beach, but we deflated them and brought them home with us.
customer_reviews.author: JBrooks1212

customer_reviews.title: Beach toys
customer_reviews.text: Theses are wonderful. They do the job and are so easy to pack on vacay
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When deflated they don’t take up any space.
customer_reviews.text: Already wrote a review the other day. They’re great. Pinch the valve slightly when inflating and deflating and setting up is quick.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Tancer

customer_reviews.title: Just OK for exercise
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because we were going to be spending several nights at a hotel with a pool and I needed to keep up with my water exercise--which requires a noodle. Well, these are ok for some of my exercises but not great and impossible for others. It folds up so completely when you sit on it and it has no resistance against the water--all soft and squishy. Really more a toy I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, just like every time I buy these inflatable noodles. I buy more because I often give mine away or leave it with someone who I meet in vacation. Never had one deflate. Never had to patch one! Good for me, especially since I am not a swimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet n' Sassy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: I had to throw these out because the stopper for the air kept popping open. It would not stay inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrene

customer_reviews.title: Had to have these
customer_reviews.text: We were on vacation and saw some folks with these. I did not wait to order... they were waiting when we got home. Can't wait to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great noodles!
customer_reviews.text: Was very suprised how well this product is made. Took all of them to a week at a tropical beach, thinking they'll break down. But only used 3 of them, every day and they're still in one piece. Will bring them to our next beach holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Estelle

customer_reviews.title: Doodles rule
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best pool floating device. It's made of plastic (you blow it up), the color doesn't come off in your hands after time like it does on styrofoam noodles, it's long lasting (can last for years), shapes to your body so you can use it in a variety of ways, easy to store. Whenever anyone gets into my pool and uses a doodle, they love it.
customer_reviews.author: abbadabbado

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love them, love them, love them. Holds up all summer in the Florida sun. We pack them for vacations, too! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: 2boxerlover

customer_reviews.title: The most useless thing I have ever purchased it on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The most useless thing I have ever purchased it on Amazon. If I could give zero stars I would !very flimsy material almost like a grocery bag and doesn’t help in the pool at all
customer_reviews.author: Ola atakpor

customer_reviews.title: A must for summer
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! They are a must if you have small children and are traveling. (Or if you are an adult like me that is too lazy to swim) I took mine all over Europe this past summer. Used them in pools, the salty sea and river! Not a single one tore or leaked air. Ended up buying more since I had to leave them behind for the cousins.
customer_reviews.author: Zana

customer_reviews.title: Best things ever!
customer_reviews.text: We have traveled all over and use them in the ocean. We also use them in our pool at home! They are a huge hit on the beach and people kept asking where we got them! Easy to float and hold a drink too! WAY better than foam noodles and they pack super easy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shari A Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids' pool party!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son's birthday party in our pool. Pretty good quality. I like that we got an assortment of straight and wavy noodles. The kids were excited. Most have lasted the summer, but as with many inflatable toys, some pop or develop slow leaks.
customer_reviews.author: K. Marti

product_meta.title: Swimline Doodles Inflatable Pool Noodle Float, 6 Count
product_meta.description: Use these incredibly durable and compact doodles to ride, sit and climb on in your pool. These 72 inch long doodles are very comfortable when used for floating and are easy to convert into any shape for endless hours of fun. Six-pack contains 3 straight and 3 curly doodles. Shipped as two blue doodles, two red doodles and two yellow doodles.
feature_bullets: 2 Blue doodles, 2 red doodles and 2 yellow doodles
Durable and compact doodles to ride, sit and climb on
Easily convert into any shape for endless fun

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars624 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
